function EP03_21()
    --.転-3【8月第4週】「姫巫女の涙」
    SaveData.Title = "姫巫女の涙"

    --//SE：ヒグラシの鳴き声　
    -- 　　＊このシーンは常時継続
PLAY_SE("SEe004.wav",1000,true)

    --//BG：メインストリート（夏・通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ The last day of summer vacation. At last, I was able to convey the improvement plans to everyone who had been absent. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0639.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・smile
 (I'm glad I somehow managed to get Segawa-san to agree. It was worth going all the way to the edge of Prefecture A to meet her.) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0640.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・normal
 (I also got a message from Lira, who went to persuade Ujō-san, saying ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ For now, I've done what I can. All that's left is to pray that my feelings reach everyone. ]])

    MSG([[ I hope I can finally sleep soundly tonight after a long time. ]])

    --//SE：トゥンク
PLAY_SE("SEa003.wav")
WAIT(300)

    --//effect：ぼかし加工
FILTER_SCREEN(3)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)
WAIT(500)
FILTER_SCREEN(0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)
    -- 　＊一瞬だけ

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI02ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0641.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Summer uniform・surprised
 ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I staggered from a sudden dizziness. Maybe it's the result of having been running around without sleep or rest for a week. ]])

    MSG([[ But everyone else is tired too. I can't be the only one to stop and rest here. ]])

    --//effect：ぼかし加工
FILTER_SCREEN(3)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ —What is this? _r I can't see clearly. My legs won't obey. I can't put strength in my whole body and find myself unable to stand. ]])

    MSG([[ Just like that, I fell forward as if the ground was pulling me down— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,0,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,0,540,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//BU：ウラン（悲しみ）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0149.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】Sadness
 ]])

    MSG([[ ...Soft. And warm. ]])

    MSG([[ Someone seems to have caught me. Wrapped in a gentle scent I've smelled somewhere before, my consciousness starts to drift away. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask012",1000,false)

    MSG([[ And then, unable to hold on any longer, my eyelids closed. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//SE：一時停止
STOP_SE("SEe004.wav",500)

    --//BG：黒バック

    --//SE：ヒグラシの鳴き声
    --//CG：夕陽がさす木の下、エリカに膝枕をするウラン
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV017ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-600,380)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,200,380,30000,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
PLAY_SE("SEe004.wav",30000,true)

    MSG([[ How much time have I been asleep? ]])

    MSG([[ My head is enveloped by a soft, feather-like sensation. My hands are warm, like basking in the sun. And there's a gentle, soft scent of tea leaves. ]])

    MSG([[ There was only one person who came to mind. ]])

    --//effect：停止
FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"EV017aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0642.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0150.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0151.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

    MSG([[ While wiping my head on her lap with a cold towel, Uran-san smiled gently. ]])

    MSG([[ I couldn't understand why she, who should be my enemy, would treat me so kindly, and I was at a loss for words. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0643.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0152.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

    --//CG：夕陽がさす木の下、エリカに膝枕をするウラン（泣）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV017ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ Her unexpectedly kind words brought tears to my eyes. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though I had carelessly spoken selfish words without knowing anything. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though I acted in ways that deserved to be disliked and doubted. Why is she so kind to me? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0153.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0154.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0155.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0156.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san’s white fingers touched my hair, gently combing it as if cherishing a child. ]])

    MSG([[ Just that made me feel strangely comfortable, as if all the weariness was washing away. My exhausted heart felt at ease. ]])

    MSG([[ Like Hyu-san once said, maybe Uran-san really has an aura of healing around her. ]])

    MSG([[ If her pure heart could wash away all fatigue and negative feelings, she truly deserves the title of "Battle Princess". ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0157.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0644.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0158.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

    MSG([[ The apology that was about to escape my throat was sharply cut off. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0159.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0160.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0161.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san is right. Even if I apologize here, nothing will be resolved. ]])

    MSG([[ Apologies just to make myself feel better aren't necessary. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0162.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0645.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

    MSG([[ If both sides of 'Princess' hold ideals they won’t compromise on, what happens? I've experienced it firsthand. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter how much you don't want to deny the other's values, sometimes you have to prioritize one. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter how much you like the other person. No matter how well you understand their feelings. You have to conclude which belief is correct. ]])

    MSG([[ In such times, there’s no system more convenient than the "Princess Election." ]])

    --//CG：夕陽がさす木の下、エリカに膝枕をするウラン
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV017aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0163.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0164.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0646.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0647.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0165.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0166.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0167.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0648.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san hesitated a bit, then quietly whispered in my ear. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0168.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0169.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0170.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san’s jade-like eyes stared at me. ]])

    MSG([[ Surely, this was her final plea. Her lonely expression conveyed a desperate wish to have me join her side, painfully clear. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0649.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0650.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

    MSG([[ And then, an idea floated up inside me. There might be another choice—one that could make everyone smile. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0651.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san’s eyes widened. It was natural to react like that when I suddenly added a condition disadvantageous to myself. ]])

    MSG([[ Then narrowing her eyes suspiciously, Uran-san answered. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0171.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0172.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

    MSG([[ Just as expected. If I lose the next Princess Election, investigating Marika will be hopeless. ]])

    MSG([[ So here I have to take the risk and hope for the slightest chance. —By making a certain request to Uran-san. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0652.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0173.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0653.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0174.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

    MSG([[ Maybe surprised by my proposition, Uran-san’s hand, which was holding mine, trembled slightly. ]])

    MSG([[ Her expression stiffened a little, and I thought I saw something shining in her eyes. ]])

    MSG([[ But soon after, her face returned to calm as she spoke. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0175.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0176.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0654.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0655.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

    MSG([[ We kept looking at the sky together for a while, while I was still leaning on Uran-san. ]])

    MSG([[ The sound of cicadas echoed as the night spread across the crimson sky. ]])

    MSG([[ The wind, which once burned my skin, had cooled just enough to gently soothe my sweaty body. The last twilight of summer vacation was coming to an end. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0656.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0177.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0657.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0178.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0179.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 ]])

    --//BG：メインストリート（夏・夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Without a word, the two of us stood up together. ]])

    MSG([[ Then, without greeting, Uran-san headed for the school gate, and I proceeded to the classroom where the 'Knights' were waiting. ]])

    MSG([[ My body no longer felt heavy. No headaches or dizziness. Thanks to Uran-san, my condition had somewhat improved. ]])

    MSG([[ And so, my first summer vacation at Yuriai Private Academy ended. ]])

    MSG([[ And the battle with Battle Princess Uran Ryuguuin truly began. ]])
    --　　　　　◆
    STOP_SE("SEe004.wav",500)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_22")

end
